section.title: Present simple questions: wh- questions with he and she
section.sectiontitle: In the question, we can use where and what + does + subject + verb.
section.text1a: Where does he play football? At the park.
section.text2a: What does she study at university? French and German.
section.sectiontitle2: In the question, we can also use who and when + does + subject + verb.
section.text3a: Who does Billy play football with? His friends.
section.text4a: When does John read the newspaper? In the evenings.

section.title: Present simple questions: yes/no questions with he and she
section.sectiontitle: In the question, we can use does + subject + verb.
section.text1a: Does he play football on Fridays? No, he doesn't
section.text2a: Does she work every Saturday? No, she doesn't.
